title: "Single-Tenant 'AI Factories' Break Colocation Data Center Mold"
excerpt: "Single-purpose AI factories will have specialized designs featuring higher power density and liquid cooling. They will be located in proximity to AI companies, including in urban centers. The size of a single-purpose AI factory could be as small as 10K SF, the report said."
